top.title: Philippines hit by 'intense' typhoon as nearly a million evacuate
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong, with sustained winds of 185 km/h (115mph), hit the Philippines as a super typhoon and later weakened.

top.title: BBC on Luzon Island as super typhoon hits Philippines
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong has made landfall in the Philippines, where more than 900,000 people have been evacuated.

top.title: Iran faces unprecedented drought as water crisis hits Tehran
top.summary: The government is pleading with Iranians to save water as reservoirs dry up and rainfall is at a record low.

top.title: China exempts chips used by carmakers from export curbs
top.summary: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.

top.title: Elon Musk's $1tn pay deal approved by Tesla shareholders
top.summary: The richest man in the world will get hundreds of millions of new shares if he hits his targets.

top.title: Why human-shaped robots loom large in Musk's Tesla plans
top.summary: The tech billionaire believes Optimus could play a big role in the lives of people around the world.
